wiki.summary: Panopticon's material from this split comprises the second half of On the Subject of Mortality. The first half can be found on Panopticon/When Bitter Spring Sleeps. Skagos' liner notes claim that "Anamnesis II" will be released on their forthcoming split with Echtra. This is presumably a typo for "Anamnesis I", unless there are two different songs titled "Anamnesis II". 1. Skagos - Smoldering Embers (12:33) 2. Skagos - Anamnesis II: A Dry, Sterile Thunder, Without Rain (15:15) Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: Panopticon's material from this split comprises the second half of On the Subject of Mortality. The first half can be found on Panopticon/When Bitter Spring Sleeps. Skagos' liner notes claim that "Anamnesis II" will be released on their forthcoming split with Echtra. This is presumably a typo for "Anamnesis I", unless there are two different songs titled "Anamnesis II". 1. Skagos - Smoldering Embers (12:33) 2. Skagos - Anamnesis II: A Dry, Sterile Thunder, Without Rain (15:15) 3. Panopticon - A Message to the Missionary (7:08) 4. Panopticon - ..Seeing.. (8:08) 5. Panopticon - Watching You (featuring, and co-written with, Jack Hannert) (9:14) Read more on Last.fm.
